channel.title: Making a Total Level Thing? It's not a command, idk just look

item.title: Making a Total Level Thing? It's not a command, idk just look
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote="Rich, post:2, topic:285268"][quote author=Rich link=topic=376810.msg2838522#msg2838522 date=1245813596]
Method to acquire the players total level;

public int totalLevel() { int total = 0; for (int i : playerLevel) { total += i; } return total; }

In the method where the player is leveling up, instead of placing it in the switch statement, simply add this after it;

if ((totalLevel() + 1) == 2277) { frames.sendMsg("@red@Well done! You've achieved the highest possible total level."); }

These are just examples, you will have to make it work for own source.
[/quote][/quote]

I know, you posted this before… I just need to know where to paste it. Can you tell me something to search for so I can paste this under it. Also, do you know how I can declare totalz as Total Level? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 05:41:21 pm[/size][hr]Rich your so useless. Why do you think I made another topic asking about this total level thing. I didn’t get an answer to it! So why should it be any different if you just copy and pasted the same answer I got last time. I needed more information then and I still do now, where do I paste this? I’m placing it in these differnt sections and it isn’t working. Can you answer a simple question like that?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Total Level Thing? It's not a command, idk just look

item.title: Making a Total Level Thing? It's not a command, idk just look
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

On most servers when you get a 99 in a skill you get a skillcape. I want to make it so that when you get 99 in every skill you get some items too. 99 in every skill would be a total level of 2277. I think I have totalz decalred for Total Level, if anyone knows how I can check that though could you show me? This is what I have so far, is this the right format I should be doing? Thanks.

case 21: // Totallevel // sendFrame164(4261); // sendFrame126("Congratulations, you've done it!", 6207); // sendFrame126("Your total level is now 2277!", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you have just acheived the highest total level possible!"); // NpcDialogueSend = true; if (totalz >= 2277) { addItem(989, 1); sendMessage( "Congratulations, you reicive some awsome items."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[1] + " in everything!"); } break; } }

Read full topic
